# Place Self

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                      | Support     |
| -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `place-self-auto`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-self-start`         | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-self-end`           | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-self-center`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-self-stretch`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
